sentences.en: And, the caffeine will also have negative influence to the nonage's sacral nerve growth.
sentences.cn: 并且, 咖啡因还会对未成年人的神经发育有负面影响.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The nonage rehabilitation therapy can enhance the curing raterate, and can decrease the rate.
sentences.cn: 结论: 早期康复治疗,可以明显提高治愈好转率, 降低致残率.

words.tran_cn: 未成年；早期；幼稚；青年时期，未成熟

trans.tran_cn: 青年时期，早期，未成熟，未成年
trans.tran_en: the state of being under any of various ages at which a person may legally enter into certain transactions, such as the making of binding contracts, marrying, etc
